name: Joey Arizona
text: Had never been to a hungry Howie's pizza ever heard about it seen him a lot of times but never actually been in one till late night on a Monday walked in and got me a pepperoni and Olive large pizza it was bomb! Really good.. I'll go back for sure.

name: Mack Dizzle
text: best flavor , always perfect. my favorite pizza place !!

name: Jason Dixon
text: Well I regular Hungry Howie's Pizza a lot but today the pizza seem to be extra cheesy and delicious maybe that's just how my wife ordered it I don't know but I loved it and the only downside why they're getting four stars is because it took too long to get me my pizza

name: Jerry Jacob
text: Does not let you down when you have your pizza cravings.  I like the Cajun crust.

name: Roger Fox
text: There pizza is okay, the employees are professional. After reading reviews it sounds like the owner canâ€™t figure out how to up his star game. I wanted to try the Philly cheesesteak pizza, though this location doesnâ€™t offer whatâ€™s on the â€¦More

name: Sarah
text: Pickup was fast and easy.  Order online pickup in store.  The Italian sub is delicious.  Try a side of bacon stuffed Howie Bread, it's great!

name: Hannah Reynolds
text: Great service. Very friendly staff who go above and beyond. Food is okay, nothing special

name: Jurek Rakoczynski
text: I love the 3 meat pizza: sausage, bacon and pepperoni.

name: keetlemeetle311
text: Best pizza around the valley for the buck. Mix up a few crust flavors and it's on like kong. The pizza sauce is pretty good too. Been eating here for over 20 years always consistant.

name: Michelle Nowakowski
text: Excellent pizza, Howies pepperoni bread was soooo good! Boneless asian chicken wings were also delicious!

name: Brianna Zerth
text: Delicious pizza, fast service. We love the stuffed crust with garlic herb and parmesan butter cheese.

name: Crystal Tucker
text: I only had the cheese sticks

name: Barry Levine
text: They were very busy but still took care of our order.

name: Jessica Horne
text: First, this is the best Hungry Howies in the area! Amazing customer service, amazing food, and an amazing establishment. Seriously props guys! Second, thank you so much to the young lady with brown hair for the heart shaped pizza! My â€¦More

name: Jonah Henry
text: Hungry Howie's is objectively the best place to buy pizza.  The quality is good, the price is low, the employees are kind, and the menu variety is legitimately unmatched.  There are over 200 million ways to order a medium one-topping pizza.  This is true freedom of choice.  This is America's pizza place.

name: Carla Buchan
text: Love hungry Howie's friendly good food good prices

name: Brock Salveson
text: There pizza is okay, the employees are professional. After reading reviews it sounds like the owner canâ€™t figure out how to up his star game. I wanted to try the Philly cheesesteak pizza, though this location doesnâ€™t offer whatâ€™s on the â€¦More

name: Kelligrace Hernandez
text: The food and crust are good and prices are decent.

name: Sierra Misty
text: My favorite pizza food chain place! Their garlic crust is amazing and out of this world

name: Robert H
text: The staff and food is great... But the owners should be ashamed of themselves. It is hotter in the building than it is outside.... In Arizona... In the middle of summer. Take care of your people and fix that. Shameful... Thank you staff for making us great pizza anyway.

name: Larry Just
text: Amazing pizza and bread sticks

name: Elizabeth Bossert
text: Best pizza I've ever had

name: Roberta Gilmore
text: Great place to eat friendly and helpful.

name: Elizabeth Murphy
text: Fast and clean

name: Phil Santos
text: Always great service, always great food

name: Alanna Lipp
text: EXTREMELY UNHAPPY! I got no meat on a salad that should have meat. No mayonnaise on the side when I asked for it and they gave me one packet on dressing for a large order of salad. Didn't realize all this until delivery guy left, which I â€¦More

name: Gustavo Silva
text: Maybe once a year or twice in last 5 years and someone else baught the food I can't say that I craved their pizza their dough freshly made??It doesn't matter cause most I these places use frozen vessels for pizza.

name: Robert Bowes
text: Friendly fast service and good food, couldn't ask for more.

name: Linda Beam
text: Great food and awesome service!

name: Juan Rosales
text: Great pizza. Nice people and Service. recommended

name: Edgar R. USA
text:
The Howie roll wasn't the best.

I've been to other Hungry Howie locations that put way more ingredients in the rolls themselves ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜”

name: Eric Straseburgh
text: Not happy with service,  first time order and they screw up my order.   Wanted the stuff crust cheese pizza got deep dish cheese.    Very disappointed.  Check your order before taking it.

name: hyatt grosjean
text: Best pizza ever

name: Orimai
text: We really enjoy this pizza, the only issue is customer service.

name: Raymond Suarez
text: Delicious

name: Archibald Ebersol
text: Love HHs stuffed crust pizza, it's mucho yummy.

name: Brian Derrick
text: Every town needs a cheap but tasty pizza place. Hungry Howie's is good inexpensive pizza. Kids love it.

name: No Dice
text: favorite pizza, flavored crust. heats up nice the next day, not after that.

name: Heather Schintler
text: Best pizza ever

name: Michael Kruk
text: So I try to order a pizza for pick-up for my son and his buddies and the guy on the phone tells me the system he is using doesnâ€™t allow him to take payment by phone, but we can order and pay online. Plus the guy was unprofessional. Thank you Hungry Howies I will never get pizza from you.

name: ernie copeland
text: Pizza delivery. Got the large Howie pan and Buffalo wings. Delivery was quick and friendly and the pizza was hot with nice crunchy, cheesey crust. Great place.

name: Alberto CastaÃ±eda
text: Always fantastic service. With accuracy and friendliness.

name: Nancy D
text: Where is love Hungry Howie's their Asiago crust is amazing, and it's always timely and super friendly staff at least at this location

name: Tim Jackson
text: Kids love the cheesey bread and pizza here. Good place if you have children. I can't answer for adults, I don't eat pizza, the cheesey bread is terrific though.

name: Kelsey Martin
text: This particular store has always done a good job. Friendly, quick service and they always have coupons up on the site so I can get a good deal.

name: Annie Elmer
text: Hard time locating this place for starters in mall area, pizza was so so at best, and prices were almost double of little Caesars.

name: james callahan
text: Excellent pizzas and good service

name: Steve Denny
text: Dough was chewy, probably because they don't or didn't temp their dough.

name: Jeremy Quiel
text: one good thing.... good crust

name: Plushy CatLady
text: I ordered through an app and they were perfect.

name: Doug H.
text: Meh. It's basically Little Caesars with better crust.

name: Dwight Walston
text: Great place

name: JOE SMITH
text: Good pizza best crust in town.

name: Shirofox
text: Love the flavored crusts

text: Good food. :]
